languages.text: Реколлигеры под управлением Реты Максимовой нуждаются в поставках текстиля и провизии. В качестве благодарности за помощь они готовы предоставить Вольному Торговцу корабельные компоненты, добытые в остове погибшего пустотного судна.

The recolligers from Reta Machsimova's crew require shipments of uniforms and provisions. As a show of gratitude for the Rogue Trader's assistance, they are willing to provide ship components extracted from the wreck of the dead voidship.
languages.original_text: Реколлигеры под управлением Реты Максимовой нуждаются в поставках текстиля и провизии. В качестве благодарности за помощь они готовы предоставить Вольному Торговцу корабельные компоненты, добытые в остове погибшего пустотного судна.

languages.text: 蕾塔·玛西莫娃手下的回收专员希望得到口粮与暖和的衣服。为了感谢行商浪人的协助，他们愿意提供从虚空舰残骸中回收的舰船部件。
languages.original_text: The recolligers from Reta Machsimova's crew require shipments of uniforms and provisions. As a show of gratitude for the Rogue Trader's assistance, they are willing to provide ship components extracted from the wreck of the dead voidship.

traits.locale_text: 蕾塔·玛西莫娃手下的回收专员希望得到口粮与暖和的衣服。为了感谢行商浪人的协助，他们愿意提供从虚空舰残骸中回收的舰船部件。

languages.text: レタ・マクシモワの一味である回収業者は制服と食料の貨物を要求している。自由開拓者の支援への感謝の意を表して、古いヴォイドシップから集めた船の部品を提供するつもりのようだ。
languages.original_text: The recolligers from Reta Machsimova's crew require shipments of uniforms and provisions. As a show of gratitude for the Rogue Trader's assistance, they are willing to provide ship components extracted from the wreck of the dead voidship.

traits.locale_text: レタ・マクシモワの一味である回収業者は制服と食料の貨物を要求している。自由開拓者の支援への感謝の意を表して、古いヴォイドシップから集めた船の部品を提供するつもりのようだ。

languages.text: Les récupérateurs de l'équipage de Réta Machsimova ont besoin d'uniformes et de provisions. En signe de gratitude pour l'aide que pourra leur apporter {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, ils sont prêts à lui fournir des composants de vaisseau extraits de l'épave du vaisseau spatial.
languages.original_text: The recolligers from Reta Machsimova's crew require shipments of uniforms and provisions. As a show of gratitude for the Rogue Trader's assistance, they are willing to provide ship components extracted from the wreck of the dead voidship.

traits.locale_text: Les récupérateurs de l'équipage de Réta Machsimova ont besoin d'uniformes et de provisions. En signe de gratitude pour l'aide que pourra leur apporter {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, ils sont prêts à lui fournir des composants de vaisseau extraits de l'épave du vaisseau spatial.

languages.text: Los recolectores de la tripulación de Reta Machsimova necesitan abastecerse de uniformes y provisiones. Para agradecer la ayuda de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, están dispuestos a entregar componentes de nave recuperados de los restos de la nave del vacío inactiva a cambio.
languages.original_text: The recolligers from Reta Machsimova's crew require shipments of uniforms and provisions. As a show of gratitude for the Rogue Trader's assistance, they are willing to provide ship components extracted from the wreck of the dead voidship.

traits.locale_text: Los recolectores de la tripulación de Reta Machsimova necesitan abastecerse de uniformes y provisiones. Para agradecer la ayuda de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, están dispuestos a entregar componentes de nave recuperados de los restos de la nave del vacío inactiva a cambio.

languages.text: Die Recolliger aus Reta Machsimovas Crew brauchen Uniformen und Vorräte. Als Zeichen der Dankbarkeit für die Unterstützung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} sind sie bereit, aus dem Wrack des zerstörten Raumschiffs geborgene Schiffskomponenten bereitzustellen.
languages.original_text: The recolligers from Reta Machsimova's crew require shipments of uniforms and provisions. As a show of gratitude for the Rogue Trader's assistance, they are willing to provide ship components extracted from the wreck of the dead voidship.

traits.locale_text: Die Recolliger aus Reta Machsimovas Crew brauchen Uniformen und Vorräte. Als Zeichen der Dankbarkeit für die Unterstützung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} sind sie bereit, aus dem Wrack des zerstörten Raumschiffs geborgene Schiffskomponenten bereitzustellen.

languages.text: Reta Machsimova'nın mürettebatındaki geri dönüşümcüler, üniforma ve erzak talep ediyor. Hür Tacir'e yardımları için teşekkür babında da ölü uçsuz gemisinin enkazından çıkarılmış gemi bileşenlerini vermeyi teklif ediyorlar.
languages.original_text: The recolligers from Reta Machsimova's crew require shipments of uniforms and provisions. As a show of gratitude for the Rogue Trader's assistance, they are willing to provide ship components extracted from the wreck of the dead voidship.

traits.locale_text: Reta Machsimova'nın mürettebatındaki geri dönüşümcüler, üniforma ve erzak talep ediyor. Hür Tacir'e yardımları için teşekkür etmek babında da ölü uçsuz gemisinin enkazından çıkarılmış gemi bileşenleri sağlamayı teklif ediyorlar.
